Highest-ranking black belt white stripe in NZ for child in Red Boat Kung-fu https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/whanganui-midweek/highest-ranking-black-belt-white-stripe-in​​-nz-for-child-in-red-boat-kung-fu/ JCM6TOTQMBDYZKRTRGU36EBZQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/whanganui-midweek/highest-ranking-black-belt-white-stripe-in​​-nz-for-child-in-red-boat-kung-fu/ JCM6TOTQMBDYZKRTRGU36EBZQ4/ Steve CarleThree other students also ranked. Mon, 30 Sep 2024 21:14:17 +0000 Justin Mackey-Hawkins (front right) achieved his black belt white stripe and is now the highest-ranked child in the Red Boat Kung-fu discipline in New Zealand. Others that graded are Samantha Hutchins (front left), Harry Wright ( back right)) and Hayden Cooper (back left) who all achieved their blue belt white stripe on Saturday, October 26. Back, in the centre is the head instructor and owner of the club, Dyane Hood.
